doc:
Dorothy DeBorba https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dorothy_DeBorba 0 Dorothy "Echo" DeBorba (March 28, 1925 – June 2, 2010) was an American child actress who was a regular in the Our Gang series of short subjects as the leading lady from 1930 to 1933. Dorothy_"_Echo_"_DeBorba ( March_28_,_1925 – June_2_,_2010 ) was an_American_child_actress who was a_regular in the_Our_Gang_series of short_subjects as the_leading_lady from 1930 to 1933 .
